sentences.english: Can water of healthy atmosphere of wrinkled giant hyssop and Kang Taike eat together?
sentences.chinese: 藿香正气水和康泰克可以一起吃吗？

sentences.english: By the time we arrived an hour late she was fuming.
sentences.chinese: 我们晚到了一小时，她正气得七窍生烟。

sentences.english: Each athletes all must have one kind of spirit, this kind of kind of overwhelming healthy tendency.
sentences.chinese: 每一位运动员都要有一种精神，这样一种浩然正气。

sentences.english: R oom decoration, upright, developers all bright house types, send 12 square balcony.

sentences.english: The lion speeds up to run and see the elephant is tramping his feet out of breath.
sentences.chinese: 狮子加速地跑向大象，却看到大象正气呼呼地直跺脚。

sentences.english: The well-known "Song of Righteousness" was composed when he was in prison.
sentences.chinese: 有名的《正气歌》就是他在监狱中作的。

sentences.english: The internal formation causes of chronic and refractory skin ulcer are deficiency of body energy.

sentences.english: He strongly despises and denounces hypocrites and villains, and encourages the Noble Spirit.
sentences.chinese: 他特别蔑视和贬斥乡原与小人，大力提倡浩然正气。

sentences.english: Clinical application of MEBO in the treatment of chronic skin ulcers;
sentences.chinese: 慢性难愈性皮肤溃疡的形成内因在于人体正气不足。

sentences.english: If leaders encourage healthy trends , they will do an easy job in political thought education.
sentences.chinese: 领导干部讲正气是思想政治工作的优势所在。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the therapeutic mechanism of Huangqin Zhengqi Capsule for the syndrome of damp retention in middle-jiao.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨黄芩正气胶囊治疗湿阻中焦证的作用机理。

sentences.english: "The healthy tendency is insufficient" and external "the perverse trend detention" with in vivo concerns.

sentences.english: Progress is an honest man; the ideal and the absolute do not filch pocket-handkerchiefs.
sentences.chinese: 进步创造正气，理想和绝对真理决不偷偷摸摸。

sentences.english: If the universe is filled with auspicious proper energy, then the earth will not blow up.
sentences.chinese: 宇宙若充满祥瑞之正气，地球就不会爆炸了。
